description: Numerators of coefficients of Green function for cubic lattice.
references: G. S. Joyce, The simple cubic lattice Green function, Phil. Trans. Roy. Soc., 273 (1972), 583-610.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
maple: Dnminus1 := 1 : print(numer(Dnminus1)) ; Dn := 1/18 : print(numer(Dn)) ; for nplus1 from 2 to 20 do n := nplus1-1 : Dnplus1 := (4*n*(20*n^2+1)*Dn-(2*n-1)^3*Dnminus1)/(36*n*nplus1*(2*n+1)) : print(numer(Dnplus1)) ; Dnminus1 := Dn : Dn := Dnplus1 : od : (Mathar)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 08 2005
